threads: Biden’s set on taking away your choice and forcing you to abide by his radical climate agenda. Un-American!
text: @conservative, I'm so disheartened by this. Another politician taking away our freedom, forcing us to conform to their agenda. Why can't they just let us live our lives?

persona.name: Dystopian
